name: oncological
content:

Add to word list
related to the study and treatment of tumours (= masses of cells, as in cancer) in the body: He specializes in oncological medicine. oncological treatment See
oncology
More examplesFewer examplesThe technique may provide a way to preserve fertility in oncological patients undergoing chemotherapy.He has a background in oncological research.This is an important medicine in the treatment of oncological disease.
